sentence.text: Polo-Like Kinase 1 (G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle), a serine-threonine kinase that is often overexpressed across multiple tumor types, is one of the key regulators of CIN and is considered as a potential therapeutic target.

entity.text: G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle

sentence.text: Rather than directly inhibiting G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle, we found that inhibition of PP2A causes selective lethality to PLK1-overexpressing breast, pancreatic, ovarian, glioblastoma, and prostate cancer cells.

entity.text: G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle
